  • Method Details

    • Configure

      public boolean Configure​(HQ hq, Config config, HQIO hqio)
      Configures initial setup by calling for: calls for initial setup of HQ-specific customization. starts initial setup of daily information from configurationFiles (ProjectConfiguration and CurrencyConfig). finding the reports and parsing the required information.
      Returns:
      boolean true if successful.

    • findTransactions

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> findTransactions()
      Finds and collects all filenames to all reports. Checks if the paths to the folders containing the reports from the sites is working. Creates a path to the file for each string, for use when reading the files. Finds and saves all filenames in a Map siteTransMap (used: Map Site, Map.
      Returns:
      Map String, Map String,String containing all Sites,Filenames and their respective paths.

    • findParseAndMapConfigFiles

      public boolean findParseAndMapConfigFiles​(HQIO hqio)
      This class finds every ProjectConfigFiles and CurrencyConfig files in a their respective directory, then read, parses and saves the information. Stores the information in exchangeRateMap and SuperCurrencyMap with ExchangeRateMap = Map of LocalDate, List ExchangeRate SuperCurrencyMap = Map of LocalDate, Map String, Double
      Returns:
      boolean, saves several lists and maps to HQ class.

    • filterFilesOnSite

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> filterFilesOnSite​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> fileMap, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> filter)
      Filters keys in a Map containing filenames and their paths on Site name Checks if the key-string contains the name of the required site. Uses the SearchSite in the filter value to filter a Map containing SiteNames, FileNames and Paths on the Key: SearchSite parameter. returns the filtered file.
      Parameters:
      fileMap - containing the full, unfiltered map of file-information.
      filter - Container for searchparameters set in the respective statsChoiceMenus.
      Returns:
      containing the filtered filenames and their paths

    • filterFilesOnPeriod

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> filterFilesOnPeriod​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> fileMap, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> filter, HQ hq)
      Filters keys in a Map containing filenames and their paths on period: startDate = uses input taken by the user. endDate = LocalDate to be calculated and applied. 1: "DAY": startDate = endDate. 2: "WEEK": startDate is previous or same Monday, endDate = Same or next Friday. 3: "MONTH": startDate equals the first day of the month, endDate = last day of the same Month. Uses the LocalDate with TemporalAdjusters (Static) library. Does not accept a weekend-date.
      Parameters:
      fileMap - containing the full, unfiltered map of file-information.
      filter - Container for search parameters set in the respective statsChoiceMenus.
      Returns:
      containing the filtered Map containting the sitenames, filenames and their paths.

    • filterOnCurrency

      public java.util.List<affix.java.project.moneyservice.Transaction> filterOnCurrency​(java.util.List<affix.java.project.moneyservice.Transaction> filterMe, java.lang.String filter)
      This method filters the incoming list of transactions based on the currency specified in the filtering process Streams, then saves the stream as a collection(List) of transactions.
      Parameters:
      filterMe - contains the semi filtered list to be filtered on their currencies.
      filter - containing the "SearchCurrency" part of a full filter.
      Returns:
      List Transaction a fully filtered list, ready for processing by statistics.
